name: Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines), Dhanbad
overview: An Institute of National Importance and one of India's oldest premier technical institutions, originally established in 1926. It is renowned globally for Mining, Petroleum, and Earth Sciences, now expanding into CSE and Electronics.

name: National Institute of Technology Jamshedpur
overview: An Institute of National Importance located in the industrial hub of Adityapur. It is one of the older RECs converted to NITs, known for strong placements in core engineering sectors.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, ECE, ME, Civil, Met, Prod)

name: Indian Institute of Management Ranchi
overview: A ninth-generation IIM established in 2009, operating from a permanent campus in Prabandhan Nagar. Known for its focus on Neuro-management and HR.

name: Indian Institute of Information Technology Ranchi
overview: An Institute of National Importance established under PPP mode. It focuses on IT and Electronics education to support the digital needs of the region.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Deoghar
overview: An apex healthcare institute established under the PMSSY to address regional healthcare imbalances. It offers undergraduate medical education and tertiary care.

name: Central University of Jharkhand
overview: A central university known for its 5-year integrated programs in sciences, engineering, and humanities. It focuses on sustainable development and tribal studies.

name: National University of Study and Research in Law
overview: The premier National Law University (NLU) in Jharkhand, established by a legislative act to provide advanced legal education.

name: Birsa Institute of Technology, Sindri
overview: The premier state government engineering college of Jharkhand, formerly affiliated to VBU/RU, now under JUT. Known for its vast campus, alumni network, and low tuition fees.

courses.name: B.Tech (Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Mining, Met, Chemical, CSE, IT, ECE, Prod)

name: Ranchi University
overview: The oldest and largest university in the state, serving as the parent institution for many colleges in the South Chotanagpur division. It offers a wide range of traditional and vocational courses.

name: St. Xavier's College, Ranchi
overview: An Autonomous College under Ranchi University, and a minority educational institution. It is one of the most prestigious colleges in the state for Arts, Science, and Commerce.

name: Rajendra Institute of Medical Sciences
overview: An autonomous institute under the Government of Jharkhand, RIMS is the premier medical college and hospital in the state.

name: Jharkhand University of Technology
overview: The affiliating university for all polytechnic and engineering colleges in Jharkhand, established to standardize technical education.

name: Vinoba Bhave University
overview: Headquartered in Hazaribagh, VBU manages colleges across the North Chotanagpur division, offering a broad spectrum of general and professional courses.

name: Binod Bihari Mahto Koyalanchal University
overview: Carved out of VBU, this university serves the Coal Belt region (Dhanbad and Bokaro districts).

name: Kolhan University
overview: Serves the Kolhan division (East & West Singhbhum, Seraikela-Kharsawan). It caters to a large tribal population and industrial workforce.

name: Sido Kanhu Murmu University
overview: Located in the Santhal Pargana division, this university focuses on providing higher education in a predominantly tribal region.

name: Nilamber-Pitamber University
overview: Established to serve the Palamu, Garhwa, and Latehar districts.

name: Dr. Shyama Prasad Mukherjee University
overview: Formerly Ranchi College, it was upgraded to a unitary state university. It is a single-campus university with a focus on vocational and traditional courses.

name: XLRI - Xavier School of Management
overview: India's oldest business school, established in 1949. While technically a private institute offering PGDM (AICTE approved), it is widely regarded as a university-level institution for management education.

name: Jamshedpur Women's University
overview: The first women's university in Jharkhand, upgraded from Jamshedpur Women's College. It aims to empower women through higher education.

name: Birsa Agricultural University
overview: A state agricultural university responsible for education and research in agriculture, veterinary science, and forestry.

name: Jharkhand Raksha Shakti University
overview: A specialized state university focusing on police science, criminology, and internal security.

name: Amity University Jharkhand
overview: Part of the Amity education group, this private university offers a wide range of industry-oriented courses.

name: ICFAI University Jharkhand
overview: A private university established under the ICFAI University Act, focusing on management, engineering, and law.

name: Sarala Birla University
overview: A private university established by the Birla family, offering courses in engineering, commerce, and humanities.

name: Usha Martin University
overview: A private university offering courses in computer applications, management, and agriculture.

name: Jharkhand Rai University
overview: A private university known for its focus on mining engineering and agriculture.

name: YBN University
overview: A private university offering a broad spectrum of courses including medical, nursing, and technical education.

name: Arka Jain University
overview: The first private university in the Kolhan region, offering polytechnic, engineering, and management courses.

name: Sai Nath University
overview: A private university established by the Jharkhand State Legislature.

name: Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Medical College
overview: A government medical college affiliated with Kolhan University, attached to the MGM Medical College Hospital.

name: Shaheed Nirmal Mahto Medical College
overview: Formerly Patliputra Medical College and Hospital (PMCH), it is a major government medical institute in the coal belt.

name: Medinirai Medical College (Palamu Medical College)
overview: One of the three new government medical colleges established in Jharkhand to improve rural healthcare.

name: Sheikh Bhikhari Medical College (Hazaribagh Medical College)
overview: A newly established government medical college associated with Hazaribagh Sadar Hospital.

name: Phulo Jhano Medical College (Dumka Medical College)
overview: Government medical college serving the Santhal Pargana division.

name: Manipal Tata Medical College
overview: A premium medical college established under a partnership between Tata Steel and Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE).

name: National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology (formerly NIFFT)
overview: A centrally funded technical institute focusing on foundry and forge technology, now rebranded to emphasize advanced manufacturing.

name: Central Institute of Psychiatry
overview: A premier central government institution for psychiatry and mental health, founded during the British Raj. It offers postgraduate degrees.

name: Ranchi Institute of Neuro-Psychiatry and Allied Sciences
overview: A state government run premier institute for mental health, often paired with CIP for its historical significance.

name: St. Columba's College
overview: Established in 1899 by the Dublin University Mission, it is one of the oldest and most heritage-rich colleges in Eastern India.

name: Karim City College
overview: A premier minority institution in Jamshedpur known for its arts, science, and vocational courses.

name: Jamshedpur Co-operative College
overview: A constituent college of Kolhan University, offering degree and law courses.

name: Marwari College, Ranchi
overview: An autonomous constituent college of Ranchi University, famous for its vocational and job-oriented courses.

name: Gossner College
overview: A minority institution affiliated with Ranchi University, managed by the Gossner Evangelical Lutheran Church.

name: Cambridge Institute of Technology
overview: A prominent private engineering college in Ranchi affiliated to JUT.

name: R.V.S. College of Engineering and Technology
overview: A private engineering college in Jamshedpur offering B.Tech and M.Tech programs.

name: Indian Institute of Technology (ISM) Dhanbad
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute

name: National Institute of Technology Jamshedpur
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute

name: BIT Sindri
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
